item.title: Over-engineered scientific paper writing
item.description: Over-engineered scientific paper writing A few weeks ago, I received comments from reviewers after I submitted my first scientific paper. While reading through the instructions, I encountered the following: While addressing comments of reviewers and revising your paper, please mark any text you update or add with a special color (e.g., blue), so that reviewers can easily notice your revisions. At first, I thought about making a macro that adds color, and using that macro every time I make a change.
